author: Bill O'Reilly
title: Reporter's notebook: The coronavirus renders Rome silent
description: NBC News' Bill O'Reilly recounts how rapidly the coronavirus has changed life in Rome.
content:
ROME Chiuso. Italy is closed.
Usually a trip to Rome is a dream assignment. But not when your flight lands and you learn that the prime minister has just declared all of Italy a Zona Rosa, or a red zone.
The minute we touched down last week, camera operator… [+5422 chars]
